blogPost.title: What are some aspects of startups that people would be surprised to know? Answer by @danshapiro, CEO of @glowforge, author "Hot Seat: Startup CEO Guidebook". https://t.co/sHnhBZBHiT https://t.co/zeXhKBBxQN
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: スタートアップの人たちが意外と知っているであろう点は何でしょうか？Hot Seat: Startup CEO Guidebook』の著者である@glowforgeのCEO、@danshapiro氏による回答です。https://t.co/sHnhBZBHiT https://t.co/zeXhKBBxQN
初创企业有哪些方面是人们会感到惊讶的？回答者：@danshapiro，@glowforge的首席执行官，《热座：创业公司CEO指南》的作者。https://t.co/sHnhBZBHiT https://t.co/zeXhKBBxQN
初創企業有哪些方面是人們會感到驚訝的？回答者：@danshapiro，@glowforge的首席執行官，《熱座：創業公司CEO指南》的作者。https://t.co/sHnhBZBHiT https://t.co/zeXhKBBxQN

previous.title: What will the impact of AI be on the marketing industry? Answer by @ElenaMMelnikova, CMO @Talkwalker. https://t.co/vvb6JSH13z https://t.co/5Z0SNnvh78

localize.full_text: AIはマーケティング業界にどのような影響を与えるのでしょうか？Answer by @ElenaMMelnikova, CMO @Talkwalker. https://t.co/vvb6JSH13z https://t.co/5Z0SNnvh78
人工智能对营销行业的影响将是什么？回答者：@ElenaMMelnikova，CMO @Talkwalker。https://t.co/vvb6JSH13z https://t.co/5Z0SNnvh78
人工智能對營銷行業的影響將是什麼？回答者：@ElenaMMelnikova，CMO @Talkwalker。https://t.co/vvb6JSH13z https://t.co/5Z0SNnvh78

next.title: How can we eliminate biases in education? Answer by @ScanlonPatricia, Founder/CEO @soapboxlabs. https://t.co/fH14UbLfwV https://t.co/qH0EfkVu2t

localize.full_text: 教育現場の偏りをなくすには？Answer by @ScanlonPatricia, Founder/CEO @soapboxlabs. https://t.co/fH14UbLfwV https://t.co/qH0EfkVu2t
我们如何才能消除教育中的偏见？回答者：@ScanlonPatricia, 创始人/CEO @soapboxlabs. https://t.co/fH14UbLfwV https://t.co/qH0EfkVu2t
我們如何才能消除教育中的偏見？回答者：@ScanlonPatricia, 創始人/CEO @soapboxlabs. https://t.co/fH14UbLfwV https://t.co/qH0EfkVu2t
